de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.pipeline.filters

Class ThresholdingFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.pipeline.filters.AbstractFilter
      • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.pipeline.filters.ThresholdingFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkDataSink, NetworkDataSource

    public class ThresholdingFilter
extends AbstractFilter
    This filter zeroes sensor data when the amplitude of a specified axis does not exceed a set minimum.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int mAxis
      The axis on which the amplitude is checked
      private float mMinimumAmplitude
      If this amplitude is not exceeded on mAxis, the sensor data will be zeroed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThresholdingFilter(NetworkDataSink dataSink, float minimumAmplitude, int axis)
      Create a new minimum amplitude filter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onData(NetworkDevice origin, SensorData sensorData, float userSensitivity)
      Called when the next element should be filtered

      • Methods inherited from class de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.pipeline.filters.AbstractFilter

        close, forwardData, getNextDataSink, hasNextPipelineElement, setDataSink, start

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • mMinimumAmplitude

        private final float mMinimumAmplitude
        If this amplitude is not exceeded on mAxis, the sensor data will be zeroed.

      • mAxis

        private final int mAxis
        The axis on which the amplitude is checked

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThresholdingFilter

        public ThresholdingFilter(@Nullable
                          NetworkDataSink dataSink,
                          float minimumAmplitude,
                          int axis)
        Create a new minimum amplitude filter.
        Parameters:
        dataSink - either a valid network data sink, or null. if null, AbstractFilter.setDataSink(NetworkDataSink) must be called prior to starting operations.
        minimumAmplitude - the minimum amplitude the values on axis must have for the data not to be zeroed
        axis - the axis which must reach minimumAmplitude, x->0, y->1, z->2

    • Method Detail

      • onData

        public void onData(NetworkDevice origin,
                   SensorData sensorData,
                   float userSensitivity)
        Called when the next element should be filtered
        Parameters:
        sensorData - sensor data to process
        origin - which network device sent the data
        userSensitivity - which sensitivity was set by the user
